unnormalised: Actually, the Mumbai local train I take usually runs late. Yesterday, it was supposed to arrive at Dadar station at 8:15 AM, but it only came around 8:40 AM. Because of that, I reached my office at Nariman Point by 9:30 AM instead of 9:00 AM. I really wish they could stick to the timetable.
normalised: Actually, the Mumbai local train I take usually runs late. Yesterday, it was supposed to arrive at Dadar station at eight fifteen A-M, but it only came around eight forty A-M. Because of that, I reached my office at Nariman Point by nine thirty A-M instead of nine A-M. I really wish they could stick to the timetable.
